website_summaries.verdict: Better size than the Faberware offering tips the "Best Bang for your Buck" title in favor of the T-fal. Buy and use with confidence.
pros: Easy to keep food an an even temperature and easy to clean after use

customer_reviews.title: Works well but seems backwards
customer_reviews.text: Bought this double boiler primarily for heating milk for homemade yogurt. It works well for that purpose in that it holds 2 quarts of milk, the milk does not burn on the bottom, and there is a small hole in the lid that is perfect for inserting a thermometer. There is one thing that puzzles me, though. The bottom pan, where water goes, is nonstick. The top part, where food goes, is not nonstick. This seems backwards to me. But the double boiler functions and cleans up well, so I can't really complain. :)
